TopicTitle: Can you remove the stock fairings from the staging menu?

Articles.Content:
It doesn't seem like you can, but I thought I'd ask. I'm using some stock fairings as part of a fuselage of a drone aircraft, to help protect various delicate bits and to make it look a bit prettier, and I don't want to accidentally stage it off!

Edited November 13, 2015 by Sophistry
I don't think so, so far only decouplers and docking ports have toggleable staging. You could lock the staging sequence with Alt-L to prevent accidental staging.

Here, use this mod to toggle it:

Twerkable Everything
I drag things like that up to stage 0 so I can space-stage through everything else and don't have to worry about those.
Note you can just add a field to the MODULE for any module that activates on staging, to turn on the toggle.

Great to know!

What's the field?

stagingToggleEnabledEditor = True

also set

stagingEnableText = Fairings: Set Staged

stagingDisableText = Fairings: Set Unstaged

(or whatever text you want)
